feed.title: GitHub Bicep Weekly Trending
feed.subtitle: Weekly Trending of Bicep in GitHub

entry.title: Azure-Samples/aca-azure-policy
entry.summary: This repository contains custom Azure Policies for Azure Container Apps.

entry.title: Azure-Samples/aks-front-door-private-link-service
entry.summary: This sample shows how Azure Front Door Premium can be set to use a Private Link Service to expose an AKS-hosted workload via NGINX Ingress Controller configured to use a private IP address on the internal load balancer.

entry.title: Azure/aca-landing-zone-accelerator
entry.summary: The Azure Container Apps landing zone accelerator is an open-source collection of architectural guidance and reference implementation to accelerate deployment of Azure Container Apps at scale.
